A **Panel** application embedded in a Quarto doc

```{panel-app-python}
import panel as pn

pn.extension(design="material")

slider = pn.widgets.IntSlider(name="Select a value", value=10, start=0, end=100)
pn.Column(
    "# Hello Panel + Quarto!",
    pn.rx("You selected: {}").format(slider),
).servable()
```

A **Matplotlib** application embedded in a Quarto doc

```{python}
#| label: fig-polar
#| fig-cap: "A line plot on a polar axis"

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 3 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(
  subplot_kw = {'projection': 'polar'} 
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1.2, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
